Package com.luna.common.swing

Class ImageSelection

java.lang.Object
com.luna.common.swing.ImageSelection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transferable, Serializable
public class ImageSelection extends Object implements Transferable, Serializable
图片转换器，用于将图片对象转换为剪贴板支持的对象
此对象也用于将图像文件和DataFlavor.imageFlavor 元信息对应
Since:
4.5.6
Author:
looly
